com.communote.server.core.user

Interface UserGroupMemberManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserGroupMemberManagementBase, UserGroupMemberManagementImpl

    public interface UserGroupMemberManagement
    Management for group memberships.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addGroup

        void addGroup(Long targetGroupId,
              Long groupId)
       throws GroupOperationNotPermittedException,
              GroupNotFoundException,
              CantAddParentAsChildException,
              AuthorizationException
        Add a group to a group if it is not already contained.
        Parameters:
        targetGroupId - ID of the target group the other group should be added to
        groupId - ID of the group to add
        Throws:
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the target group is an external group
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the target group or the group to add does not exist
        CantAddParentAsChildException - in case adding the group would lead to a cyclic group hierarchy
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • addUser

        void addUser(Long groupId,
             Long userId)
      throws GroupNotFoundException,
             UserNotFoundException,
             GroupOperationNotPermittedException,
             AuthorizationException
        Add a user to a group
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to add the user to
        userId - the ID of the user to add
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user does not exist
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the group is an external group
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • addUserForExternal

        void addUserForExternal(Long groupId,
                        Long userId,
                        String externalSystemId)
                 throws GroupNotFoundException,
                        UserNotFoundException,
                        AuthorizationException
        Adds a user to an external group. The external group must have an externalSystemId that is equal to the value of the externalSystemId parameter.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the external group to add the user to
        userId - the ID of the user to add
        externalSystemId - the ID of the external system the group should belong to
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        UserNotFoundException - in case the user does not exist
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the group is not a group from the external system identified by the externalSystemId
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

      • containsEntityDirectly

        boolean containsEntityDirectly(Long groupId,
                               Long entityId)
                        throws GroupNotFoundException

        Returns true if the group or user is a direct member of the group.

        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException

      • containsUser

        boolean containsUser(Long groupId,
                     Long userId)
              throws GroupNotFoundException

        Returns true if the user is a direct or indirect member of the group.

        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException

      • containsUserDirectly

        boolean containsUserDirectly(Long groupId,
                             Long userId)
                      throws GroupNotFoundException

        Returns true if the user is a direct member of the group.

        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException

      • countMembers

        int countMembers(Long groupId)
        Return the number of direct members of a group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group whose members should be counted
        Returns:
        the number of direct members

      • getUsersOfGroup

        List<UserData> getUsersOfGroup(Long groupId)
                        throws GroupNotFoundException
        Return all users who are direct members of a group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of the group.
        Returns:
        a list of all users who are direct members of the given group.
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist

      • getUsersOfGroup

        Collection<Long> getUsersOfGroup(Long groupId,
                                 String externalSystemId)
                          throws GroupNotFoundException
        Return all IDs of users who are direct members of a given group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of the group.
        externalSystemId - If set, only users of the given external system are considered.
        Returns:
        a list of all user IDs who are direct members of the given group.
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist

      • removeEntityFromGroup

        void removeEntityFromGroup(Long groupId,
                           Long entityId)
                    throws GroupOperationNotPermittedException,
                           GroupNotFoundException

        This method removes an entity from a group.

        Throws:
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException
        GroupNotFoundException

      • removeGroupFromAllExternalGroups

        void removeGroupFromAllExternalGroups(Long groupId,
                                      Collection<Long> groupIdsToIgnore)
                               throws GroupNotFoundException,
                                      AuthorizationException
        Remove an external group from all external groups of the same external system that contain this group as a direct member.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the external group to remove from the other external groups
        groupIdsToIgnore - list of IDs of groups the group should not be removed from. Can be null.
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

      • removeGroupFromAllGroups

        void removeGroupFromAllGroups(Long groupId)
                       throws GroupNotFoundException,
                              AuthorizationException
        Remove a group from all groups it is a member of.
        Parameters:
        groupId - The id of the group to remove
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager or the internal system user

      • removeUserForExternal

        void removeUserForExternal(Long groupId,
                           Long userId,
                           String externalSystemId)
                    throws AuthorizationException
        Removes a user from an external group. The external group must have an externalSystemId that is equal to the value of the externalSystemId parameter. If the group does not exist or the user is not a member of that group nothing will happen.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the external group
        userId - the ID of the user to remove
        externalSystemId - the ID of the external system the group originated from
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

      • removeUserFromAllGroups

        void removeUserFromAllGroups(Long userId)
                      throws UserNotFoundException
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
